Improvements.Improvement: Use String constant for repeated strings
Improvements.Description: The string 'Download url generation failure.' is used repeatedly. Instead of hardcoding this string value in multiple places, it would be better to define it as a constant and use the constant instead. This makes the code easier to manage and less error-prone. If we need to change the string in the future, we only need to change it in one place.

The try-with-resources statement is a try statement that declares one or more resources. A resource is an object that must be closed after the program is finished with it. The try-with-resources statement ensures that each resource is closed at the end of the statement.
